name: The Night of Vionardo Da Vinki
name_original: The Night of Vionardo Da Vinki
description:
Made in Collaboration with awesomeness560

IMPORTANT: 

The game is playable in the browser, however there is a development console that we recommend closing to make it stop interrupting the game.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Dash - Shift (You dash in the direction of the keys you are holding)

Double Jump - Press jump while in the air to jump again

Possess - Press F to possess an enemy while their back is turned to you. You become undetectable and immune to candlelight when you are possessing. (Lasts around 10 seconds).
